title: Astroship
description: Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.
fullDescription:
Modern tools

Astroship comes preconfigured with Astro, TailwindCSS, and Alpine.js for a modern developer experience out-of-the-box.

Responsive components

Donâ€™t spend hours reinventing the wheel!  Astroship comes with all the components you need to ship your marketing site fast.

  • Responsive navigation bar with dropdown menus
  • Features section with icons
  • Price comparison cards
  • Contact form

Page layouts

We have created a set of pre-built pages so you start with a fully functional site.

  • Home page with hero section
  • Pricing page
  • About page highlighting your team
  • Blog pages
  • Contact page preconfigured for Web3Forms

title: AstroPaper
description: A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.
fullDescription:
AstroPaper is crafted with best practices and accessibility in mind. If you want a blog with clean design, fully responsiveness, good accessibility (keyboard/VoiceOver navigation, proper landmarks etc), and fast performance, then AstroPaper is for you.

Highly Customizable

AstroPaper is highly customizable - from color schemes, social links to meta tags for SEO. You can customize AstroPaper according to your taste and requirements.

Features

  • Build with TypeScript
  • Fuzzy search with React & FuseJS
  • Accessible out of the box
  • SEO-friendly
  • Light & Dark mode support
  • Includes draft posts & pagination
  • Provides Sitemap & RSS feed
